bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Archie Woods, November 17, 1941

div1.p: Hench writes that he enjoyed the Woods' visit.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Archie Woods, November 17, 1941
div1.opener:
November 17, 1941
Mr. Archie Woods
14 Wall Street
New York City
Dear Archie:
div1.p:
We had fun, didn't we? It was grand to have
you with us. I send under separate cover a non-rheumatic
reprint you may be interested in. Tell me which Rheumatism
Reviews you don't have and they will be sent at once.

Best to your good wife. All the girls agreed
“Archie is some dancer.” Ooh-ooh!
div1.closer: Sincerely, P. S. Hench, M. D. psh:ds
